thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text: I have ordered trees and shrubs from Willis Orchards for several years now. The website is easy to use, the trees and shrubs have always arrived in perfect condition. They package all products well, the shipping costs are fair and the shipping is always speedy. Could not ask for a better shopping experience or better trees and shrubs, Will continue to buy from Willis in the future, I would highly recommend them to anyone using the web to buy from a nursery.
